name: Ultrasound Prank
description:
Fool your family and friends to think your are pregnant! This is the best prank ever!

Send your friends and family a fake ultrasound that shows you or your girlfriend is pregnant!

This is an awesome prank to fool your mom, dad, bae, boyfriend....ANYONE!

It is hilarious and totally believable! You enter your name, hospital and date so it appears on the ultrasound. Email or message to your mom, and watch her FREAK OUT! It's the best prank you can pull on a parent or boyfriend.
